Class ParserNodeFunctionEvaluator

ParserNodeFunctionEvaluator class

This class parses access control condition expressions. DO NOT CHANGE! This is a core UserFrosting file, and should not need to be changed by developers.

PhpParser\NodeVisitorAbstract
